Major_Arcs.title: Setting the Scene and Introducing Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the main characters and settings, establishing initial conflicts and themes such as independence, skepticism, and romantic tensions in both past and present timelines.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Refusal and Ghost Town Skepticism
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the initial setting in the old West, contrasting it with modern times, and establishes early character dynamics and conflicts related to personal commitments and beliefs about Ghost Town.

sub_scenes.title: Ghost Town Flashback and Modern Disruption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a flashback narrative providing historical context to Ghost Town, before returning to the present day conflict of its impending destruction due to modern development plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Modern Day Disruption: Airport Plans for Ghost Town

Major_Arcs.title: Emotional Reactions and Practical Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the emotional and practical conflicts arising from the airport plan, including romantic disappointments, workplace tensions, and initial business discussions related to cattle transport.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Dismissal and Construction Site Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the woman's emotional response to the airport news, her romantic feelings being dismissed, and her subsequent uncomfortable encounter with construction workers at the site.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with Construction Workers and Disdain

sub_scenes.title: Airport Business and Father-Daughter Dispute
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a business discussion among men regarding cattle transport by air related to the airport project, followed by a domestic conflict between Nan and her father concerning her involvement and attitude.

Major_Arcs.title: Nan's Emotional Turmoil and Pursuit of Cal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Nan's emotional distress and her attempts to seek comfort and clarity regarding her feelings for Cal, culminating in her decisive action to pursue him and confront her uncertainties.

sub_scenes.title: Conflicting Comforts and Decision to Act
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan receiving varied comfort and advice regarding Cal, leading to her internal doubt and ultimate decision to take action and seek direct confirmation from Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Horses to the Airport and the Deal

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Confession and Weather Shift
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's emotional confession to Cal, his somewhat detached response, his departure, and Nan's subsequent reflection, before a shift to the broader weather crisis impacting the community.

narrative_arcs.title: Recollections of Changed Weather and Difficult Journey

Major_Arcs.title: Snowstorm Crisis and Community Response
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the narrative to focus on a severe snowstorm and its impact on the community, highlighting concerns about livestock, community solidarity, and the hope brought by external aid.

sub_scenes.title: Weather Report and Livestock Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the severity of the snowstorm through weather reports and community discussions focused on the dire situation of livestock fodder shortage.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Comfort and Reassurance Amidst Hardship
Recalling Past Winter's Severity and Impending Starvation
Riding Out to Face the Crisis and Uncertain Future

sub_scenes.title: Domestic Comfort and External Relief
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene contrasts Nan and Cal's domestic interactions amidst the snowstorm with the unexpected arrival of aid from the sky, bringing relief and hope to the community.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Restlessness and Persistent Snowfall
The Sound of Hope: Arrival of a Plane
Relief from the Sky and Reflections on Romance

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and Town Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the character of Chane Benson and shifts the setting to a Western town, initiating a new storyline focused on town conflicts, hero worship, and escalating tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Cowtown Showdown and Character Analysis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chane Benson through a dramatic showdown in a Western town, followed by bystanders and Jeff and Sally analyzing his character and actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Advice on Decency and Confrontation with Benson

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Worries and Benson's Ominous Presence
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Sally's increasing worries about Jeff's behavior and her conversation with Clyde, contrasted with the unsettling introduction of Mr. Benson and his ominous descriptions of Chane Benson.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern Over Jeff's Gun Obsession and Control
Reassurance and Premonition of Finding Jeff
Clyde's Retrospective Account of Jeff's Disappearance
Introducing Mr. Benson and Casual Banter
Mr. Benson's Ominous Tone Shift and Mention of Death

sub_scenes.title: Article Controversy and Chane Benson's Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene revolves around the controversy of Clyde's article about Benson, Sally's angry confrontation with Clyde, and Chane Benson's declarative threat to clean up Juniper Town.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Justification for Writing About Benson
Sally's Distrust and Ominous Description of Benson
Benson's Threat to Clean Up Juniper Town

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner Invitation and Escalating Tensions with Chane Benson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the events surrounding the dinner invitation to Chane Benson, escalating tensions, misunderstandings, and culminating in physical confrontation and pursuit.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Invitation and Initial Perceptions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the planning and execution of inviting Chane Benson to dinner, and the initial observations and opinions formed about him during the dinner.

narrative_arcs.title: Flashback to Benson's Articles and Consequences
Considering Inviting Chane Benson for Dinner
Sally's Persuasion and Jeff's Agreement to Invite Chane
Invitation to Dinner and Observation of Chane's Demeanor
Discussion on Chane's Artistic Skills and Character

sub_scenes.title: Moonlight Confrontation and Unwanted Kiss
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the escalating tension during and after dinner, including a moonlight compliment, jealous accusations, and culminating in Chane's unwanted kiss and Sally's reaction.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Confrontation and Accusation of Trap
Sally's Accusation and Demand for Honesty
Sally's Angry Explanation to Jeff about Chane's Actions and Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Physical Confrontation and Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the immediate aftermath of the unwanted kiss, leading to a physical confrontation between Jeff and Chane, and a subsequent chase to save Clyde from Chane's perceived threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Angry Confrontation and Jeff's Punch
Sally's Desperate Plea and Jeff's Fall
Urgent Warning and Chase After Chane

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution of Benson Conflict and Introduction of Ranch Story
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc resolves the conflict with Benson and transitions the narrative to a new setting at a ranch, introducing new characters and a brewing range war.

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Defeat and Newspaper Office Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the confrontation with Benson, showing his defeat, the tense aftermath, and the dedication of the newspaper staff in the face of danger.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Confrontation and New Hired Hand
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a ranch setting, introducing a new conflict and the arrival of Steve Daley as a hired hand, setting up new character dynamics and plotlines.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation and Approbation of Steve Daley's Hiring

Major_Arcs.title: Range War Threat and Betsy & Steve's Romance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc develops the threat of a range war and focuses on the burgeoning romance between Betsy and Steve amidst the ranch conflicts and preparations.

sub_scenes.title: Range War Warning and Journey to Town
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene highlights the escalating threat of a range war, Hank's warning to Betsy, and the beginning of Betsy and Steve's journey to town, initiating their closer interaction.

narrative_arcs.title: Offer of Accommodation and Lingering Doubts
Journey into Town and Expressed Gratitude
Hank's Orders and Material for a Dress

sub_scenes.title: Town Confrontation and Gunfight Imminent
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the escalating confrontation in town, starting with Fred Bridges' interception of Betsy and culminating in a near gunfight situation.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Decision and Romantic Confessions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Betsy making a firm decision about hiring a gunslinger, seeking acceptance from authority, and finally confessing her feelings for Steve, leading to mutual romantic declarations.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Firm Decision to Hire a Gunslinger
Justification and Acceptance from Authority Figure
Hank's Concern and Betsy's Softened Stance
Sudden Intense Feelings and Mutual Confession

Major_Arcs.title: Horse Theft and Devil's Pass Showdown
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the escalation of the ranch conflict with horse theft, Betsy and Steve's differing approaches to conflict, and their confrontation at Devil's Pass.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Hand Confrontation and Horse Theft Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Old Man Bridges' arrival and confrontation with ranch hands, Betsy and Steve's differing views on violence, and the realization of the horse theft.

narrative_arcs.title: Old Man Bridges' Arrival and Ranch Hands' Confrontation
Betsy's Warning and Steve's Determination Amidst Threats
Betsy's Assertion of Authority on Gun Use
Aftermath: Horse Theft and Realization of Loss

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit to Devil's Pass and Romantic Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Betsy's desperate plea to stop Steve, his resolute departure, her subsequent pursuit to Devil's Pass, and the romantic resolution of their conflict amidst the showdown.

narrative_arcs.title: Ride to Devil's Pass and Arrival at Gunfire Scene
Arrival at Devil's Pass and Confrontation

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie, Fred, and Dave - Romantic Entanglements and Business Deals
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the complex romantic relationships between Carrie, Fred, and Dave, intertwined with business dealings and contract negotiations, leading to emotional confrontations and resolutions.

sub_scenes.title: Personal Conflicts and Fence Dispute Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a new set of characters and conflicts, starting with a personal dispute on horseback and transitioning to ranch concerns and a fence dispute with Fred Gordon.

narrative_arcs.title: Ranch Concerns about Curley and Outsiders

sub_scenes.title: Reconciliation, Conflicted Feelings, and Interruption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene explores attempts at reconciliation and apology, Carrie's conflicted feelings for Dave and Fred, and a confrontational interruption by Fred Gordon.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Clarifications and Romantic Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts escalating confrontations, Carrie's clarifications of her affections, a proposal for truce between Dave and Fred, and a romantic resolution culminating in Carrie and Fred's marriage proposal and acceptance.

sub_scenes.title: Contract Concerns, Rejection, and Business Focus
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to business concerns surrounding the Carlton contract, Fred's justifications, Carrie's angry rejection of Dave, and a renewed focus on securing the contract.

sub_scenes.title: Carlton Contract Negotiation and Victory
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the negotiation with Mr. Carlton, including anticipation, confrontation, assertion of independence, emotional aftermath, and ultimately, the triumphant securing of the Carlton contract.

narrative_arcs.title: Assertion of Independence and Business Acumen

sub_scenes.title: Carrie and Dave's Final Emotional Exchange and Reflection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Carrie's angry declarations, her dismissive encounter with Dave, her confession of love for Fred, Dave's resigned departure, and Carrie's reflective ride with her father.

narrative_arcs.title: Father's Intuition and Long Ride Reflection

sub_scenes.title: Carrie and Fred's Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Carrie and Fred's storyline with a bedside visit, clarification of misunderstandings regarding the contract and their feelings, leading to emotional confessions, regret, and a passionate romantic resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Revelation of Fred's Arrival and Misunderstanding
Carlton's Explanation of the Beef Contract
Realization of Foolishness and Seeking Reassurance
Affectionate Embrace and Plea for Kiss

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk and Rance - Mistaken Identity, Pursuit, and Moral Dilemma
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc initiates a new storyline centered on Dirk and Rance, involving mistaken identity, a chase, a gunfight, and a moral dilemma, exploring themes of law, justice, and personal loyalty.

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Intrusion and Dirk's Injury Revealed
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with Dirk's urgent entry and mistaken identity, quickly revealing his injury and setting up the mystery surrounding his situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Revelation of Dirk's Injury and Medical Examination

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Ranch Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows the grandfather's concern and investigation into Dirk's situation, leading to a confrontation at the ranch with the Marshal and a misunderstanding involving Chris.

narrative_arcs.title: Ranch Confrontation and Demand for Authority

sub_scenes.title: Accusation, Defense, and Truce
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene clarifies the accusation against Dirk, the defense of his actions as a fair fight, and the establishment of a temporary truce due to Dirk's injury, while also revealing the Ranch Owner's evolving feelings.

narrative_arcs.title: Law vs. Justice and Dirk's Injury

sub_scenes.title: Love Confessions and Jealous Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Chris's confession of love to the Ranch Owner, her internal conflict due to feelings for Rance, and Rance's jealous intervention and accusation.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Understanding and Escape Plan

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Pursuit, and Gunfight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dirk and Chris's escape attempt, the Marshal's relentless pursuit, the nighttime evasion efforts, and the eventual violent confrontation and gunfight.

narrative_arcs.title: Leaving the Wounded Marshal and Woman's Reflection
Dirk's Farewell and Escape to Mexico
Chris's Return to Rance and Woman's Thoughts
Rance's Pursuit and Dirk's Escape Confirmed

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Resolution and Wedding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc provides the romantic resolution for Rance and the Ranch Owner, detailing Rance's recovery, forgiveness, mutual confessions of love, and culminating in their wedding.

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Recovery and Forgiveness
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Rance's recovery from his wounds, the sleepless vigil of the Ranch Owner, and her forgiveness towards Chris and Rance's father.

narrative_arcs.title: Clearing Chris's Name and Woman's Forgiveness

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Climax and Wedding Day
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the romantic climax with the Ranch Owner and Rance's mutual confession of love and marriage proposal, leading to the anticipation and beginning of their wedding ceremony, dramatically interrupted by Dirk's arrival but resolved happily.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession of Love and Lingering Fear
Confrontation and Clarification at the Wedding
